Spells:
Augury (Automatic Writing2 Divi): Self has 90% chance to learn weal or woe outcome of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future
Commune (Automatic Writing5 Divi): Deity answers 20 yes/no questions
Contact Other Plane (O5 Divi): Self asks 10 questions of extraplanar entity
Divination (Automatic Writing4 Divi): Self has 90% chance to learn useful advice on a proposed action up to 1 week in the future
Identify (O1 Divi): R60' Cone gives self info on magical auras, +10 Spellcraft (item properties) for conc or 60 rd
Legend Lore (O4 Divi): Self learns legends about specified person, place, or object
Locate Object (O3 Divi): Self senses direction of object or type in 1200' radius for 20 min
Mass Owl's Wisdom (O6 Tran): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius gain +4 Wisdom for 20 min
Moment Of Prescience (O8 Divi): Self gains +20 attack, check, or save once w/in 20 hr
Symbol Of Death (Spontaneous Symbology8 Necr): R60' Rune slays (DC 24 Fort neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 200 min or 150 HP killed
Symbol Of Fear (Spontaneous Symbology6 Necr): R60' Rune panics 20 rd (DC 24 Will neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 200 min
Symbol Of Insanity (Spontaneous Symbology8 Ench): R60' Rune causes insanity (DC 24 Will neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 200 min
Symbol Of Pain (Spontaneous Symbology5 Necr): R60' Rune causes pain (-4 attack and skill and ability checks) for 1 hr (DC 24 Fort neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 200 min
Symbol Of Persuasion (Spontaneous Symbology6 Ench): R60' Rune charms for 20 hrs (DC 24 Will neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 200 min
Symbol Of Sleep (Spontaneous Symbology5 Ench): R60' Rune sleeps creatures w/10 HD or less for 3d6x10 min (DC 24 Will neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 200 min
Symbol Of Stunning (Spontaneous Symbology7 Ench): R60' Rune stuns for 1d6 rd (DC 24 Will neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 200 min
Symbol Of Weakness (Spontaneous Symbology7 Necr): R60' Rune inflicts -3d6 Strength (DC 24 Fort neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 200 min
Time Stop (O9 Tran): All but self halt and become invulnerable for 1d4+1 rd
Tongues (O4 Divi): Touched can communicate in any language for 200 min
Vision (O7 Divi): Self learns answer about target person, place, or object
Wish (Lore Oracle9 Univ): Alters reality, with few limits
Magic Notes:
Charisma Oracle Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level O1, O2, O3, O4
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Arcane Archivist (Oracle): May spend +1 spell slot to cast Sorcerer/Wizard spell from lore book 1/dy
Automatic Writing: 1 hr meditation yields results of Commune spell 1/dy
Brain Drain: R100' Mental probe inflicts 20d4 HP and yields 1 Knowledge check/rd at target's bonus (DC 24 Will neg) for 4 rd 5/dy
Elemental Spell (Cold): May use +1 spell slot to convert half or all spell damage to cold damage
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Final Revelation (Lore Mystery): May cast Wish 1/dy
Maximize Spell: May use +3 spell slot to maximize all variable effects on chosen spell
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Persistent Spell: May spend +2 spell slot to force target to take worse of 2 saving throws
Quicken Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cast chosen spell as a free action 1/rd
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Spontaneous Symbology: May use spell slot to cast any Symbol spell
Whirlwind Lesson: May absorb lesson from magical tome in 8 hr and share with 20 others for 4 dy
